events.message: Hello, I placed an order two weeks ago and the package still hasn't arrived. The tracking shows no updates, and I'm really worried about the delay.
System assigned the cluster Delivery Delay based on keywords related to shipping and lack of delivery updates.
Your case has been assigned to one of our delivery support agents who will look into the shipping delay immediately.
Hi there! Thank you for reaching out. I understand how frustrating a late shipment can be. I am here to help you resolve this.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the latest status with our logistics partner?
Sure, my order number is 1234567890 and the shipping address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield. I appreciate your help with this matter.
Thank you for the details. I have contacted our courier and found that the package was delayed due to unexpected weather conditions. It is now expected to arrive within 3 days.
Thanks for the update. I understand the cause for delay and will wait three more days. I appreciate your prompt response and support.
Glad I could assist. Your order should arrive shortly. Please reach out again if anything else comes up.
We are following up to confirm that your package arrived as expected. Please let us know if you have any further issues.
As we have not heard back, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and please contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
